name: Heart Of The Chasm
Lore: 'The Cloud City chasm''s central fin was engineered with a tensile strength unsurpassed by anything in the region, save the silk of the Kashyyyk treeworm.',
Text: 'During your deploy phase, use X Force to rearrange all Cloud City sites, where X = total number of those sites. All cards at a given site move along with that site. OR Cancel Off The Edge. OR Search your Reserve Deck, take one Weather Vane into hand and reshuffle.',
